reviewText: Why is this thing so expensive?! Half the price listed would be more appropriate. And would sell more copies. Just saying . . .
Great Addition to anyones Thomas Merton Collection Well Done and a Great DVD...

The production was good.  The female narration on the first 1/4 of the video appeared to sound much to amateurish.  Towards the second half of the film, the comments and embellishments by those who knew Merton allowed the video to take on more life.  This work follows Merton on the last year of his monastic journey as he gained more interest in Eastern philosophical thought.  It appeared to be a joyous time for Merton who was finally allowed to spread his wings a bit and meet with those of other faiths and traditions for a grand tour.

I thought the production was much too short.  Perhaps more time should have been given to his writings from the period.  There were some but a more detailed analysis could have been better.  Overall I was pleased but the sense I wanted more.
